        private static java.lang.String[] diceContainerToStrings(DiceContainer container,
                                                         boolean printSelectors,
                                                         java.util.Set<CellState> cellStates)
        Creates a String[] array which represents a contrainer that can be printed on console.
        Parameters:
        container - object to read
        printSelectors - boolean to read
        cellStates - FULL, EMPTY and/or NEAR
        Returns:
        "Stringfied" version of the container.

        printNumbers - boolean to read
        x - coordinate to read
        y - coordinate to read
        accepted - check to read
        Returns:
        "Stringfied" version of the cell.

      • boardToStrings

        private static java.lang.String[] boardToStrings(Board board,
                                                 boolean printSelectors,
                                                 java.util.Set<CellState> cellStates)
        Creates a String[] array which represents a given board that can be printed on console.
        Parameters:
        board - Board to be printed
        printSelectors - If true, each cell will be printed with the corresponding selection letter
        cellStates - If `printSelectors` is true, this parameter can be used to print the cell selector only if `acceptedCell(cellStates)` is true. Set to null for no filtering. \ Performs the handling of the "first move situation" automatically (no filter on borders when `board.isEmpty()`).
        Returns:
        "Stringified" version of the board.

      • scoreLine

        private static java.lang.String scoreLine(java.lang.String name,
                                          int value,
                                          java.lang.String leftPadding,
                                          boolean showValue)
        Create a line (String) for score displaying.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the parameter
        value - Points of the related parameter. Values below zero will not be printed.
        leftPadding - String of spaces that will be inserted at the end of the line, right after `┃`.
        showValue - true if the value must be shown
        Returns:
        String defined with parameters, with total length == `PLAYER_WIDTH` and `┃` characters at the start and at the end of the line.
